entries.journal_entry_description: Enter the Blackscale Slave Camp, gain acess to the control center, and gain the Avatar Platform access codes.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Gain entry into the command bunker located in the center of the Blackscale stronghold. The access codes can be found inside the locked room on the second floor.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: In order to gain entry into the power room, you will need to get the access codes that only Captain Beshk has. Kill him and get his passcode.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Enter the power core and turn off the power to the bunker. This will disable the lock on the command center.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Enter the bunkers command center and steal the access codes from its central computer system.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Now that you have recovered all the required pieces to gain access to the Avatar Space Platform, return to Mosolium.
